code: import React,{useState,useEffect}from'react';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Peeps=()=>{const[peeps,setPeeps]=useState([]);useEffect(()=>{fetchPeeps();},[]);const fetchPeeps=async()=>{try{const response=await fetch('http://localhost:8080/posts');const data=await response.json();setPeeps(data);}catch(error){console.error('Error fetching peeps:',error);}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("main",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:"All Peeps"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("ul",{className:"list-group",children:peeps.map(peep=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("li",{className:"list-group-item",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("strong",{children:[peep.user.username,":"]})," ",peep.content]},peep.postId))})]})});};export default Peeps;
